content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_terracotta

thought: To craft cyan_terracotta, I first need to craft cyan_dye, which requires blue_dye and green_dye. To craft blue_dye, I need to place a cornflower into the crafting grid, therefore I will move the cornflower from slot 28 into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1
